1.0.name: wordpress/custom-order-id-for-thecartpress-ecommerce
1.0.description:
Allows to set a custom Order ID in the eCommerce.

This is useful if the merchant wants the orders don't begin by 1.

The plugin it's a new tool for TheCartPress, eCommerce plugin for WordPress.

  • TheCartPress Extend: plugins, themes and custom development
  • TheCartPress Demo
  • TheCartPress Community/Support
  • TheCartPress Site
